name: The fearfull Ghost
description:
Hey "The fearfull Ghost" is my first Game I made. I hope it is playable. 

Once there was a Ghost called Spooky and he had three Fears. On day a bad guy called TimeKing rewinded the time. You must help Skoopy to beat hist Fears again.

Thanks to Brackey and Blackthornprod for helping with awsome tutorials.
